member.name: T:IsUniqueCharacters.Program
member.summary: Problem - Implement an algorithm to determine if a string has all unique characters. What if you cannot use additional data structures?

member.name: M:IsUniqueCharacters.Program.ContainsUniqueChars(System.String)
member.summary: Looks at the characters in the provided string to see if the entire string contains unique characters
member.param: The string that was provided by the user
member.returns: A boolean value to determine if the string contains unique characters or not
